accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text-slate-500 is only used for secondary labels. Main text must be text-slate-700 or darker.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined above.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'SidebarLayout' pattern. Fixed sidebar on left (w-64), scrollable content on right.
4. DASHBOARD: Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the main dashboard. Do not just stack cards vertically.
5. TABLES: Use Shadcn Table but style it with the 'tables' rules above. Add 'data-testid' to all rows.
6. LANGUAGE: Prepare the UI for i18n. Use a context provider for language state (Hindi/English).
7. AI FEATURES: For the 'AI Paper Generator', use a clean, step-by-step wizard interface (Stepper component).
8. THEME: Default to Light Mode. It is an admin panel, legibility is key. Dark mode is secondary.
9. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (button, input, link) MUST have a data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly (only on sticky headers/modals).
